text: is a railway station on the Osaka Metro Tanimachi Line in Tennoji-ku, Osaka, Japan. ==History== *December 17, 1968: "Shitennoji-mae (Yuhigaoka) Station" opened. *August 29, 1997: renamed "Shitennoji-mae Yuhigaoka Station". ==Layout== There are two side platforms with two tracks on the first basement. ==Surroundings== * Shitennō-ji * Tennoji Police Station * Osaka Immigration Office, Tennoji Branch ==Stations next to Shitennoji-mae Yuhigaoka== Category:Osaka Metro stations Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1968
title: Shitennōji-mae Yūhigaoka Station
